subject: Design
title: Chinese Feng Shui: Designing With Energy
description: A 60-second lesson on Chinese Feng Shui: Designing With Energy.

hook.text: For 3,000 years, Chinese design has been governed by invisible energy flows called qi.

buildup.text: Feng shui dictates where to place doors, beds, and mirrors to harmonize a space's energy.

discovery.text: The system is based on observation: south-facing rooms get more light, clutter creates stress.

twist.text: Modern research confirms some feng shui principles â€” natural light and decluttering improve wellbeing.

climax.text: Whether you believe in qi or not, feng shui's 3,000-year design experiment has real results.

punchline.text: A 3,000-year-old layout system still drives modern real estate.

quiz.question: What is feng shui fundamentally about?
options: Arranging spaces to harmonize energy flow
